info.title: Close a filled in combobox in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandComboboxAndSetValueToAlabama
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the combobox, and sets the combobox value to 'Alabama'

user: With the reading cursor on the combobox, close the combobox.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the combobox, close the combobox.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, exit Forms Mode to activate the Virtual Cursor by pressing Escape.

assertions.expectation: Change in state (to collapsed) is conveyed
